description: This file defines the AppState class, which manages global application state, configuration, and session tokens for a Flutter application. It provides methods to initialize state, update tokens, and access environment configuration, implementing ChangeNotifier for reactive UI updates.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: A singleton class extending ChangeNotifier to hold global app config and session token. Provides initialization, token management, and environment access.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the AppState with an environment configuration and an optional initial token.

methods.name: setToken
methods.description: Updates the session token and notifies listeners.
